bioghist.head: History
bioghist.p: Author, editor at THE NEW YORK TIMES, professor at the School of Journalism from 1925 to 1950, authority on correct English usage. Columbia University A.B. 1924; B.Lit. 1925, School of Journalism.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Correspondence, Columbia University Graduate School of Journalism course notes, and printed materials. The papers deal with his books, the courses that he taught at the School of Journalism, and his "Winners & Sinners" department (correct English usage) at THE NEW YORK TIMES.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: This collection is located off-site. You will need to request this material at least twenty-four (24) hours in advance to use the collection in the Rare Book and Manuscript Library reading room.
